>
[Wand of Mental Purification](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2282)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Healing" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=89" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 140 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Red feathers hang from the handle of this ivory wand. Holding it brings a sense of gentle calm.

**Activate** <actions string="" /> Cast a Spell;  **Frequency** once per day, plus overcharge;   **Effect** You cast [_soothe_](/Spells.aspx?ID=291) of the indicated rank, and can attempt to [counteract](/Rules.aspx?ID=371) one [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106) effect on the same target. Treat the _soothe_ spell's level as 1 higher for this counteract check.

**Craft Requirements** Supply a casting of _soothe_ of the appropriate rank.
